blog.content:
Nmap (Network Mapper) l√† m·ªôt trong nh·ªØng c√¥ng c·ª• quan tr·ªçng nh·∫•t trong lƒ©nh v·ª±c b·∫£o m·∫≠t m·∫°ng. ƒê√¢y l√† c√¥ng c·ª• m√£ ngu·ªìn m·ªü ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë·ªÉ kh√°m ph√° m·∫°ng v√† ki·ªÉm tra b·∫£o m·∫≠t.

**C√†i ƒë·∫∑t Nmap:**

- **Linux**: `sudo apt-get install nmap` (Ubuntu/Debian) ho·∫∑c `sudo yum install nmap` (CentOS/RHEL)

**C√°c l·ªánh Nmap c∆° b·∫£n:**

2. **Qu√©t to√†n b·ªô subnet**: `nmap 192.168.1.0/24`

3. **Qu√©t t·∫•t c·∫£ port**: `nmap -p- 192.168.1.1`

4. **Qu√©t port c·ª• th·ªÉ**: `nmap -p 80,443,22 192.168.1.1`

5. **Ph√°t hi·ªán OS**: `nmap -O 192.168.1.1`

6. **Ph√°t hi·ªán d·ªãch v·ª• v√† version**: `nmap -sV 192.168.1.1`

**C√°c k·ªπ thu·∫≠t qu√©t n√¢ng cao:**

**NSE Scripts h·ªØu √≠ch:**

**C√°c th√†nh ph·∫ßn ch√≠nh:**

**2. Target Tool:**

**Workflow c∆° b·∫£n:**

blog.title: Metasploit Framework - Exploitation v√† Post-Exploitation

blog.content:

**C√†i ƒë·∫∑t Metasploit:**


**Windows**: T·∫£i installer t·ª´ Rapid7

**Giao di·ªán v√† Components:**

**1. msfconsole**: Interactive console ch√≠nh
**2. msfvenom**: Payload generator
**3. msfdb**: Database management
**4. Auxiliary modules**: Scanners, fuzzers

**Kh·ªüi ƒë·ªông v√† Database:**

```bash
# Kh·ªüi ƒë·ªông database

# Kh·ªüi ƒë·ªông console
```

**C√°c l·ªánh c∆° b·∫£n:**

```bash

# Th√¥ng tin module

# Xem options

# Ch·∫°y exploit

# ho·∫∑c

```

**Workflow th·ª±c t·∫ø:**

```bash

```

**2. Vulnerability Scanning:**
```bash

```

**3. Exploitation:**
```bash

```

**Meterpreter Commands:**

```bash

# File system

# Network

# Privilege escalation

# Persistence
```

**Payload Generation v·ªõi msfvenom:**

```bash

# Linux ELF

# Web shells

```

**Multi-handler setup:**

```bash

```

**Session Management:**

```bash

# Interact with session

# Background session

# Kill session

```

**Advanced Features:**

**1. Pivoting:**

**2. Resource Scripts:**

**3. Custom Modules:**

**Best Practices:**

**Legal v√† Ethical:**

- Tu√¢n th·ªß lu·∫≠t ph√°p ƒë·ªãa ph∆∞∆°ng
